kannada_original: ಬಾನ ತಾರೆಯ ನೋಡಿ ಮರೆಯದಿರು ಕಿರು ಸೊಡರ;
english_transliteration: Bāna tāreya nōḍi mareyadiru kiru soḍara;
english_translation: Seeing the star in the sky, do not forget the small lamp;
Fill the lamp of life with the oil of love.

kannada_original: ಈ ದೀಪ ಚೈತನ್ಯ, ಜಗದ ಅರಿವಿನ ಜ್ಯೋತಿ;
english_transliteration: Ī dīpa caitanya, jagada arivina jyōti;
english_translation: This lamp is vitality, the light of world knowledge;
Is life the light of a small lamp? – Muddu Rama.
